title: Vai malandra (feat. Tropkillaz & DJ Yuri Martins)

lastfm.summary: "Vai Malandra" is the 4th & last single from Brazillian singer Anitta’s project entitled Check Mate, in which she released a new song each month. “Vai Malandra” celebrates the freedom of expression, sexiness and empowerment of women. It highlights the energy and confidence that Anitta, Zaac and Maejor exude throughout the song. The lyrics, combined with the infectious beat and seductive melodies, create a high-energy, dynamic anthem for self-love and embracing sensuality. Read more on Last.fm.
lastfm.title: Vai Malandra (feat. Tropkillaz & DJ Yuri Martins)
